name: Majid Askary
profile: Junior Data Scientist with a strong foundation in data analysis, machine learning, and algorithm design. Skilled at solving complex problems, designing efficient algorithms, and transforming raw data into actionable insights. Adept at collaborating with multidisciplinary teams and communicating technical findings to non-technical audiences. Passionate about leveraging data-driven approaches to solve real-world challenges and continuously expanding technical expertise.

Projects.name: ImmoEliza Project
Projects.description: Built a data pipeline (web scraping, EDA, ML, FastAPI, and deployment) to make price predictions of the Belgian real-estate market using Python
